summary: Selector to change the tool in the left hand from outwardgripper to defaultgripper
name: selector: change_tool(left_hand, outwardgripper, defaultgripper)

children.summary: the target is that the left hand is holding the default gripper
children.name: target: hold(left_hand, defaultgripper)

children.summary: Sequence to change the tool in the left hand from outwardgripper to defaultgripper
children.name: sequence: change_tool(left_hand, outwardgripper, defaultgripper)

children.summary: A precondition is that the left hand is holding the outwardgripper
children.name: precondition: hold(left_hand, outwardgripper)

children.summary: A precondition is that the outwardgripper is empty
children.name: precondition: is_empty(outwardgripper)

children.summary: The action to change the tool in the left hand from outwardgripper to defaultgripper
children.name: action: change_tool(left_hand, outwardgripper, defaultgripper)
